data.title: Wild Birthday Party Venues & Packages
data.meta_description: Choose one of our wild venues at the Phoenix Zoo for your child's next birthday party and enjoy a fun, stress-free day celebrating with friends and family.
data.text:
Your basic birthday party package includes admission for 12 adults and 10 children. The birthday child and guardians should be included in this head count. All children participating in the party (doing crafts, receiving a party favor, etc.) must be counted as part of child head count even if they are two years of age or under.

Electronic tickets for all your guests will be sent to you in your final confirmation email. You will need to distribute these to you party guests in advance of their arrival at Phoenix Zoo.

Each party guest (Adult and Child) will be required to show a ticket at turnstiles for entry.

Guests that do not have tickets on them will be required to purchase party admission on site before they are allowed entry to the Zoo. No guests will be allowed entry without a ticket.

Once your guests have these tickets, they can gain access to the park during general operating hours and will be able to stay in the park until closing. We encourage party guests to come and enjoy the full Zoo before and after party bookings if time allows.

Final number of attendees is due 1 week prior to your party. The total number of guests allowed will be limited by size of the party location. All guests will need a ticket for entry into the Zoo.

Adults – Extra adults may be an additional charge.

If the extra adults are members, they will be asked to show their membership card at turnstiles for entry.

If the extra adults are not members, they will need to be added to your ticket count 1 week prior to party date when final details and payment are due.

Additional Adults for Non-Member parties are $39.95.

Additional Adults for Member parties are $34.95.

Charges will be added to your final WILD Birthday Invoice and be paid in advance when final payment is made for your party.

Adults that show up on party day without an admission ticket will need to purchase one on their own to gain entry.

Children – Extra Children will be an additional charge.

As a birthday party is a special event, fees for party admission are a bit higher than normal admission rates.

All Additional children should be added to your head count 1 week prior to party date when final details and payment are due.

Additional Children for Non-member parties are $42.50

Additional Children for Member parties are $37.50

Charges will be added to your final WILD Birthday invoice and be paid in advance when final payment is made for your party.

Children that show up on party day without an admission ticket will need to have a Birthday Party ticket purchased for them on site (at cost to guardian with them) to gain entry.

*A large increase in size of party can be accommodated by booking a double party.

Double party bookings will receive 20 children party admissions, 24 adult admissions & 2 cakes.

Yes! Your hosted party includes all day admission for you and all of your guests. We ask that you do not come to your party Ramada more than 15 minutes before the start of your party. We have parties booked before and after yours and need to allow the hostesses time to clean up.

If you are bringing additional items into the Zoo, it is recommended that a stroller or wagon is brought to assist with the transportation.

We do not have the capacity to store/refrigerate items before or after the party.

We do not have the ability or the staff to offer a cart ride to and from your party location. If you are bringing additional items into the Zoo, it is recommended that a stroller or wagon is brought to assist with the transportation.

We do not have the capacity to store/refrigerate items before or after the party.

Guests that do not have tickets on them will be required to purchase party admission on site before they are allowed entry to the Zoo. No guests will be allowed entry without a ticket.

Electronic tickets for all your guests are included with your email. You will need to distribute these to your party guests in advance of arrival at Phoenix Zoo. Once your guests have tickets, they can gain access to the park during general operating hours and will be able to stay in the park until closing. We encourage party guests to come and enjoy the full Zoo before and after party bookings if time allows.

You can bring your own food if it is commercially prepared. You are welcome to bring a cooler with soda, water, etc. (No alcoholic beverages or glass bottles allowed). Phoenix Zoo does not have ice for sale. The Zoo does not have storage areas for coolers or other items before or after your party. With your ticket and a hand stamp you can leave the park to place items in your car and gain reentry to go walk around and enjoy the Zoo.

Each pizza has eight slices. Four to six pizzas for a basic party should be plenty. We are NOT able to provide pizza for the parties starting at 10 a.m. or earlier. When you order pizza through the Zoo in advance, it is delivered to your party location with plates and napkins for pizza service. If you decide to bring in your own pizza or outside food, you are responsible for getting it to and from your party site and providing plates for your guests. Day-of orders cannot be accommodated.
